page.title: 13Renovation
page.content: Our terrace house is fifty years old being a pre-war house. Before being renovated it had two bedrooms,a living room and a kitchen. When we moved in the house was cold, smelly and damp. The people before us did not have a bathroom. They just had a tin bath which they had left behind when we moved in. I used to get bathed in it. The renovation made a lot of changes. The yard was made smaller because we got a bathroom extension as did about 21 houses out of 95 being renovated. Some people got a bedroom on top of their bathroom. One woman had her attic opened up and a window put in. Now it is a games room. Now most of the houses have new Parkray fires which heat the water and central heating. I like my house as it is warm and cosy and it is near the park, the play centre and leisure centre.
